body:
LEVI DAO 签署禁止细菌（生物）和毒素武器的发展、生产及储存以及销毁这类武器的公约

LEVI DAO signs the convention prohibiting the development, production and storage of bacterial (biological) and toxin weapons and the destruction of such weapons

https://www.un.org/zh/documents/treaty/files/A-RES-2826(XXVI).shtml
author: 0x1F1C29c94aBe2b8F06B403Cc5a61c479167ebc3D

space.name: 上海约西亚网络科技有限公司
